title: Lam Dong's organic developers thrive as organic policy passed.
content: "This is a great news for us! We are now able to grow better and healthier products for our customers" - Nguyen Van Nen, owner of CaoNguyenGoods farms, Lam Dong.

title: Farmers of the Central Highlands: Transforming Agriculture for a Sustainable Future
content: "Thanks to recent innovations and support, we are no longer just farmers but stewards of our land," shares Le Thi Hoa, a tea plantation owner in Dak Nong. "With organic practices, our products gain more than valueâ€”they gain purpose."
